title: Ep 44: Eye of the Boobholder
description:
Today's proceedings:  The Judgies take a trip over to r/NiceGuys where a neighbor wants to get a little bit too friendly, a lover tries whispering into his partner's ear, a Netflix account is being stolen by family members,  a child born out of an affair has a dire realization about her sister's new boyfriend, and a lady wonders: is beauty really in the eye of the boobholder?  We also talk about FLORIDA MAN bringing a boxing glove to her daughter's school.    

Get your Sheesh Merch here! 

http://etsy.com/shop/Judgiespodcast 



Watch the Show on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwDbo_sKQX-ymY3d-Q1HxGQ



Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod   

Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod   



Music by: Iván  

https://open.spotify.com/artist/0dlYkMquTDLwn0Wh3A8U4s?si=5ayT43JfRVux2qrKpOkvpg  



 Logo/Designs by:  

https://www.youtube.com/user/lilwillis121


Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-judgies/support

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
